@use JSDoc

@constructs

Table of Contents

  • Overview
  • Syntax
  • Examples
  • Related Links

Overview

When using an object literal to define a class (for example with the @lends tag) the @constructs tag allows you to document that a particular function will be used to construct instances of that class.

Syntax

@constructs [<name>]

Examples
